nodes.text: Urber was a location. The hyperspace prospector Mari San Tekka, who Eye of the Nihil Marchion Ro used to locate unconventional Paths through hyperspace for the Nihil marauder group, discovered a route between Urber and the Expansion Region planet Pasaana. San Tekka, believing Ro sold her Paths to the Galactic Republic, informed him of the route, which Ro stored in the central database of his flagship, Gaze Electric.
